summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to other legal team members, forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing made on April 29, 2021, in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: A legal filing was made in the Electronic Court Filing (ECF) system for the criminal case United States v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 30, 2021, from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim.
The email forwards a courtesy copy of an ECF filing made on April 29, 2021, in case S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), United States v. Maxwell.
The email is addressed to multiple legal team members, including Laura Menninger, Christi, Nadcll, and Pagliuca.
The attached filing is titled 'Reply_to_MDC_Legal_4-29-21.pdf', indicating it is a reply in the Maxwell case.
